thread.title: Jeremy Collins

author: Jeremy Collins
title: Jeremy Collins
text:
I started with 10x. It was decent, a good starting point to get used to the feeling. The next morning I did 60x. I forgot where I was in the universe for about 10 minutes. I can't say it was particularly pleasant, but if you want to rethink your place in the universe this is a place to start. I felt more of a body trip with the smaller extract. I don't remember feeling much of anything on the 60. Time disappears.
Don't be like me. Bring a sitter.
